attributes.action: Allow tax payers to be able to find and use NHS dentist of Government to pay compensation
attributes.additional_details: As a working tax payer I am disgusted that I cannot find an NHS dentist that will take me on. If the Government cannot provide me or others with the basic dentist services our national insurance is paying for then we should be compensated by having our national insurance refunded for each week until we can be allocated and treated by the dentists we pay for.
